# Cancelled Tender by Defence Construction Canada
## Solicitation Details
- **Solicitation Reference**: PW-22-01015976
- **Announcement Date**: December 6, 2022
- **Tender Closing Date**: March 31, 2026 (14:00:00)
- **Solicitation Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding

## Tender Details
- **Status**: Cancelled
- **Service/Trade**: Construction services, specifically:
	+ Construction of One and Two Dwelling Buildings
	+ Construction of Multi-Dwelling Buildings
	+ Construction of Warehouses and Industrial Buildings
	+ Construction of Other Buildings
	+ Construction Services, Not Elsewhere Specified
	+ General Heavy Construction
	+ Other Special Trade Construction Work
- **Regions of Opportunity**: 
	+ Europe
	+ Canada
	+ Mexico
	+ United States

## Contract Details
- **Contracting Entity**: Defence Construction Canada
- **Contracting Address**: 19th Floor, Constitution Square, 350 Albert Street, Ottawa, Ontario, Canada
- **Contact Person**: Mark Smith
- **Contact Information**:
	+ Phone: 613-859-0549
	+ Email: [mark.smith@dcc-cdc.gc.ca](mailto:mark.smith@dcc-cdc.gc.ca)

## Trade and Preference Details
- **Trade Agreements**:
	+ Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
	+ World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
	+ Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
